comment.content: Copyright c 2000 2003 IBM Corporation and others All rights reserved This program and the accompanying materials are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1 0 which accompanies this distribution and is available at http www eclipse org legal epl v10 html Contributors IBM Corporation initial API and implementation

The StyledText widget implements this listener to receive notifications when changes to the model occur It is not intended to be implemented by clients or by implementors of StyledTextContent Clients should listen to the ModifyEvent or ExtendedModifyEvent that is sent by the StyledText widget to receive text change notifications Implementors of StyledTextContent should call the textChanging and textChanged methods when text changes occur as described below If the entire text is replaced the textSet method should be called instead

This method is called when the content is about to be changed Callers also need to call the textChanged method after the content change has been applied The widget only updates the screen properly when it receives both events param event the text changing event All event fields need to be set by the sender see TextChangingEvent

This method is called when the content has changed Callers need to have called the textChanging method prior to applying the content change and calling this method The widget only updates the screen properly when it receives both events param event the text changed event
This method is called instead of the textChanging textChanged combination when the entire old content has been replaced e g by a call to StyledTextContent setText param event the text changed event
